tool_description: A Job Board API for jobs in Germany and remote with visa sponsorship, relocation support, and 4-day work week jobs.

api_list.name: Free Job Postings API
api_list.description: This API allows companies to post job openings that offer visa sponsorship, four-day work weeks, and remote opportunities. It aims to improve work-life balance and productivity while providing transparency regarding salary and compensation.

optional_parameters.name: Content-Type
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the resource.

optional_parameters.name: visa_sponsorship
optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether the job offers visa sponsorship.
